C

Category - Class in model
This class represents a category that is one of the pre-coded values in NAMES instance variable.
Category(String) - Constructor for class model.Category
A one argument constructor validating if passed variable exists as a pre-coded value.

clearBag() - Method in interface model.ClientUserModel
Method running when client suddenly closes the app, clears the bag of a client, ensuring that all items return to the stock by calling server
clearBag() - Method in class model.ModelManager
 
Client - Class in mediator
 
Client() - Constructor for class mediator.Client
 
ClientUserModel - Interface in model
Interface containing methods only running on client side (are not used on server side), as their purpose is handling current order of the client (it is handled by client and only sent to server after it is finalized or to update the stock for other users).
completeOrder() - Method in class viewmodel.EmployeeOrderView
 
completeOrder(String, Order) - Method in class mediator.Client
 
completeOrder(String, Order) - Method in interface mediator.RemoteModel
 
completeOrder(String, Order) - Method in class model.ModelManager
 
completeOrder(String, Order) - Method in interface model.ModelUser
Method responsible for setting status of the order as completed and saving it into database
